properties.site-address: Banbury Road University Sites, Banbury Road, Oxford
properties.notes: Many of the existing buildings on the site contribute to the character of the North Oxford Victorian Suburb Conservation Area or are listed. Therefore any major redevelopment is unlikely to be suitable but there is some potential to intensify existing uses.. This site is allocated for mixed use development (including student accommodation and university staff housing) in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Blackbird Leys District Centre, Blackbird Leys Road, Oxford, (Blackbird Leys Central Area)
properties.notes: Blackbird Leys is one of five priority regeneration areas identified in the Oxford Core Strategy 2026.. The site is allocated for mixed use development (including housing) in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
properties.ownership-status: mixed ownership

properties.site-address: Former office and stores for telephone engineering depot, Hollow Way, Oxford, OX3 7JS, (BT Site)

properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Land at canalside, Oxford, OX2 6BX, (Jericho Canalside)
properties.notes: The site is in a sensitive location within the Jericho Conservation Area and adjacent to the Grade I listed St. Barnabas Church.. Planning permission (14/01441/FUL) granted for a mixed use development to include 23 dwellings.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Churchill Hospital and Ambulance Resource Centre, Oxford
properties.notes: Hospital operations would need to be maintained.. The site is allocated in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF. Key worker housing linked to the hospital is identified as a suitable use. General housing and student accommodation are identified as acceptable complementary uses.
properties.ownership-status: owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Land at Court Place Gardens, Oxford, OX4 4EW, (Court Place Gardens)
properties.notes: The site includes a listed building. This site is partially greenfield and partially brownfield (as shown on the site location plan). The land area in hectares given on this Register relates to the brownfield part of the site only. The capacity of this site has been calculated based on development being focused on the existing built footprint.. The site is allocated for housing development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority

properties.site-address: Nielsen, London Road, Oxford, OX3 9RX
properties.notes: This site is partially greenfield and partially brownfield (as shown on the site location plan). The land area in hectares given on this Register relates to the brownfield part of the site only. The capacity has been calculated with the greenfield sports field excluded.. The site is allocated for residential-led development in the Sites and Housing Plan adopted in February 2013 post NPPF. Prior approval was granted for the change of use of B1a offices to C3 residential to provide 93 dwellings in 2016 (ref: 16/02678/B56). Prior approval was granted for change of use of B1a to C3 to provide 134 dwellings in 2017 (ref: 17/02969/B56). There is likely to be further capacity for residential on this site.
properties.ownership-status: not owned by a public authority
